SELECT b.id, b.board_type AS boardType, b.board_type2 AS boardType2, b.board_type3 AS boardType3, b.title, b.user_id AS userid, b.created_at AS createdAt, CASE WHEN c.bid IS NOT NULL OR b.look = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS look FROM board b LEFT JOIN comments c ON b.id = c.bid WHERE b.board_type = 'inquiry'
AND b.board_type2 = #{boardType2}
AND b.board_type3 = #{boardType3}
AND b.board_type3 IN ('login','signup','withdraw','account')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('couponissue','couponuse','eventjoin','winnercheck')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('orderguide','paymentmethod','paymenterror','receipt')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('tracking','deliverytime','deliveryfee','globalshipping')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('ordercancel','refund','exchange','refundprocess')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('reservation','payment','changecancel')
AND b.board_type3 IN ('guide','security','alert','safepayment','privacy')
ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
